TheBlueAlliance¶

class the_blue_alliance.TheBlueAlliance(event_id=None, behind_threshold=None)[source]¶

Singleton for collecting information from The Blue Alliance

Args:
event_id (str): the event id used by The Blue Alliance
get_event_matches()[source]¶

Gets all the match information for an event

get_event_rankings()[source]¶

Gets all the ranking information for an event

get_event_teams()[source]¶

Gets all the team logistic information for an event

is_behind(matches)[source]¶

Checks if The Blue Alliance is behind compared to the scouters

make_request(url)[source]¶

Send request a url

Args:
url (str): the url where the data is
